briefTitle: Safety and Immunogenicity Study of GSK Biologicals' Seasonal Influenza Candidate Vaccine (GSK2321138A)
officialTitle: Partially-blind Immunogenicity and Safety Study of GSK Biologicals' Seasonal Influenza Vaccine GSK2321138A in Adults.
summary: This study is designed to assess the safety and immunogenicity of a GSK Biologicals' investigational vaccine GSK2321138A in adults 18 years old and older. This study is also designed to assess the lot-to-lot consistency of vaccine GSK2321138A. The blinding will be double blind for all groups except for the GSK2604409A Group which will be open.

primaryOutcome.measure: Titers for Hemagglutination Inhibition (HI) Antibodies Against 4 Strains of Influenza Disease
